list.text: Using different shapes and sizes, add Christmas ornaments to your banister's garland.
A cute gingerbread house placed on top of vintage books (right next to a little evergreen tree, to boot) makes for understated festive décor.
Celebrate your favorite Christmas carol by displaying the lyrics atop your mantle.
Forget the fireplace — this blogger hung her stockings along her stairs, and highlighted the collection with thick garland and twinkle lights.
Shiny ball ornaments don't just look good on trees — they actually make for a lovely holiday centerpiece, tucked neatly into a bowl full of greens.
Mix faux garland with real greenery, weaving in pine cones and a matching thick ribbon. This blogger kept hers secure with zip ties.
Dress up craft-store letters with faux moss for a message that's got meaning and texture.
